name: HORMIGO
description:
WASD TO MOVE
SPACE TO HIT
ESC FOR PAUSE

HORMIGO ALPHA 13.6 (2017)

HORMIGO is a side scrolling platformer metroidvania RPG with a "childish" or naif art and design.

You play as Hormigo! He is an ant who learns martial arts to protect his friends from other insects by jumping on them or just punching them in the face.

This is an alpha version but im working on it and i will be updating.
